full_title_(бүтэн_гарчиг): *, ,YI DAM MKHA' 'GRO CHOS SRUNG SPYI LA SBYAR RUNG GI BZLOG PA'I CHO GA MI MTHUN PHYOGS LAS RGYAL BA'I RU MTSON ZHES BYA BA BZHUGS SO, ,
colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @006A *, ,(CES YI DAM CHOS BSRUNG SPYI LA SBYAR RUNG GI BZLOG PA'I CHO GHA MI MTHUN PHYOGS LAS RGYAL BA'I RU MTSON ZHES BYA BA 'DI NI, RNAM DPYOD YANGS PA'I DGE SLONG BLO BZANG DPAL LDAN DANG, DAD LDAN DGE SLONG MKHAS MCHOG SOGS @006B DON GNYER CAN 'GA' ZHIG GIS YANG YANG BSKUL BA'I NGOR, BTZUN GZUGS RATNA'I MING CAN GYIS, ^ RJE 'JAM DBYANGS BZHAD PA DANG, GRUB DBANG THO'U BKVAN RIN PA CHE, ,SKYABS RJE NGAG DBANG BSTAN PA'I RGYAL MTSAN SOGS KYI GSUNG LAS BTUS TE BSGRIGS PA'I YI GE PA NI DGE SLONG PA tU BHA TRAS BRIS PA DZA YANTU, ,BKRA SHIS, ,)
